amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to set aside at least $20 million for suicide outreach prevention via direct advertising and the use of online social media.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-570 to instruct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to set aside at least $20 million for suicide outreach prevention via direct advertising and the use of online social media.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
